Articles.Content: I got this idea from KSK's first flight story, what about a museum? it would act like achievements and when you reach a certain goal the parts or model parts of your rocket get displayed to show you your accomplishments!
Sorry to rain on your parade, but this has been suggested already.
Still a good idea though, I'd like to see this in the game.

Possibly not quite what you were meaning, but I think a science log of some sort is going to be in the next release, so it will probably be part of the R&D component of the game.

I hope they include biome mapping at the same time...
I like this idea... like you can put your favorite craft there!
